name: youtube-video-id
description: Extracts the YouTube video ID from a url or string.
author: Mark <mark@remarkablemark.org>

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:min && npm run build:unmin
scripts.build:min: webpack index.js -o dist/youtube-video-id.min.js -p --output-library YouTubeVideoId --output-library-target umd --mode production
scripts.build:unmin: webpack index.js -o dist/youtube-video-id.js --output-library YouTubeVideoId --output-library-target umd --mode development
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
